original: Nasavitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
analyzed: na sa vitakka sa vicāram dhammam paṭicca na sa vitakka sa vicāraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe

original: Naavitakkavicāramattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naavitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
analyzed: na a vitakka vicāra mattam dhammam paṭicca na a vitakka vicāra mattaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe

original: Naavitakkaavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naavitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na avitakka avicāram dhammam paṭicca na avitakka avicāraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā aṭṭhacattālīsa, ārammaṇe pañcacattālīsa, adhipatiyā sattacattālīsa …pe… purejāte āsevane catucattālīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhacattālīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā aṭṭhacattālīsa ārammaṇe pañcacattālīsa adhipatiyā sattacattālīsa pe purejāte āsevane catucattālīsa pe avigate aṭṭhacattālīsa
